    Development Env Description

    25 Apr 2019

    MacBook

    Anaconda 3 installed on 04-25-2019

    See the Anaconda Navigator Environments tab to see all the existing Python environment

    The base is installed in \anaconda3 (python 3.7.3) and the others are installed in ~\anaconda\envs

    Access Python Jupyter Notebook starting by

    Most of python/notebooks are in the pythonWS folder
